title: Change the link to the new app in Google Play
message: Change the link to the new app in Google Play

title: Added layouts for v14+ devices since they require different layouts.
message:
Added layouts for v14+ devices since they require different layouts.
Widget updates (and by that also networking) is now done in an AsyncTask.
Use the Appcompat library to support older devices when showing menus using ActionBar.
If the widget is on a lock screen another layout is used.
Show selected crypto currency logo in widget in stead of always Bitcoin.
Show 3 decimals if value is less than 10.

title: Removed semi colons from SQL statements (not needed).
message: Removed semi colons from SQL statements (not needed).

title: Increasing the app version, the min SDK version from 3 to 7 and targeting latest version (19).
message:
Increasing the app version, the min SDK version from 3 to 7 and targeting latest version (19).
Uses the non required feature "android.software.app_widgets".

title: Added PLN to MtGox, removed CRYPTOXCHANGE and added COINBASE, BITCUREX, BITPAY,…
message: Added PLN to MtGox, removed CRYPTOXCHANGE and added COINBASE, BITCUREX, BITPAY, BTER, BITKONAN, THEROCK and BIT2C to the exhcnage services.

title: Added Litecoin and Quark as well as PLN and ILS to currencies.
message: Added Litecoin and Quark as well as PLN and ILS to currencies.

title: Added logos for Litecoin and Quark.
message: Added logos for Litecoin and Quark.

title: Upgrading Achartengine from 1.0.0 to 1.1.0.
message: Upgrading Achartengine from 1.0.0 to 1.1.0.

title: Bugfix: If the rate service is changed in the preferences, the first currency…
message: Bugfix: If the rate service is changed in the preferences, the first currency conversion for that rate service is selected.

title: This commit is the version 0.9.9.
message:
This commit is the version 0.9.9.
* Added support for other currencies than USD (currently only supported by MtGox): EUR, GBP, AUD, CAD, CNY, JPY, RUB and SEK.
* Added a weekly graph.
* Added support for the BTC-e Bitcoin exchange.
* Removed support for the Bitfloor Bitcoin exchange.
* Added a grayscale mode for users having problems seeing the different colors.
* The red color is now lighter.
